questions.text: I am most often in situations that feel calm.
I feel protected from threats or harm.
I feel respected for who I am.
I feel included when I am being myself.
I can count on people around me to do what they say they will do.
People, including me, are treated fairly.
I can be fully attentive to my surroundings.
I am regularly exposed to nature and clean air.
I feel alert and energized most of the time.
The sights, sounds, touches, tastes and smells in my environment are manageable.
I can remain calm and clear-headed in a stressful situation.
I follow routines that benefit my energy, focus and mood.
Most of what I do, each day, interests me.
I spend my time in ways that I find important.
I build strong bonds when working with others toward a common goal.
Things I do have a meaningful impact.
I apply feedback from others to better myself.
I have people in my life that I care about and who care about me.
I intend good things to come out of the choices I make.
I usually behave in a way that I am proud of.
I make habits out of things that are good for me.
I can plan, organize and complete the steps toward a goal.
I can apply the energy it takes to complete my goals.
I carefully consider how my decisions may be influenced by others.
I can easily build a positive connection with new people.
I can understand what is expected of me in different situations.
I can listen to understand others different opinions with patience.
I can come to an agreement with others most of the time.
I can express my thoughts and feelings to others.
I feel I have shared power with others.
The questions in this survey were all clearly understood.
I felt comfortable answering all of the questions in this survey.
